location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Political Department letter no. 6 from James Pringle Riach, Acting Resident, Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter gives news of the movements of the Honourable Company's cruisers Benaresand Nautilus,and of the seizure of boats at Bedda by people belonging to Sheikh Tannoon been Shackboot [Tahnun bin Shakhbut], who had in turn complained about the seizure of ten of his pearl boats by one of his subjects, who had settled Bedda under the authority of the Sheikh of Bahrine [Bahrain].
